definitions.definition: a person whose job is cutting up and selling meat in a shop or killing animals for this purpose

examples.text: He owns the butcher's in the main street.

definitions.definition: a person who kills people in a cruel and violent way
to have a look at something

wordOrigin: Middle English: from an Anglo-Norman French variant of Old French bochier, from boc ‘he-goat’, probably of the same ultimate origin as the verb buck.
